channel.title: Need help finding a client for my hamachi server
channel.description:
i downloaded a source and a client from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530457.0.html
im looking for a working client that my friend can use to get on my server because so far every client i used no matter what client i use, its either not ip changeable or its and invalid client!
any suggestions please im usin icyscape's source and client if you didnt click on the link below?

item.title: Need help finding a client for my hamachi server

item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

don’t use hamachi… no one will join.
